Title: Kotae wo Dasu no Da
Description: ["An animated music video for I LUV ME's ", Kotae wo Dasu no Da, " song, aired on NHK's Minna no Uta.", ' ', ' ', ' ', ' The song was written, composed and sang by Mihono Sato to encourage both herself, the students and the ones with an uncertain future to take a step forward.']
